ServerSide.connectivity

Class Server

  • java.lang.Object
    • ocsf.server.AbstractServer
      • ServerSide.connectivity.Server
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Server
extends ocsf.server.AbstractServer
    Server: Implementation of AbstractServer that can receive Message type message.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  Server.ClientConnectionHandler
      ClientConnectionHandler: Describe handlers of Server clients connection status changes.
      static interface  Server.MessagesHandler
      MessagesHandler: Describes handlers of Message messages.
      static interface  Server.ServerStatusHandler
      ServerStatusHandler: Describe handlers of Server connection status changes.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Server()
      Create Server instance, getting the port from ServerConfiguration.getInstance() and logger from LogManager.getLogger().
      Server(java.util.logging.Logger logger, int port)
      Create Server instance, the listening on specific port.

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void clientConnected(ocsf.server.ConnectionToClient client)
      Hook method called each time a new client connection is accepted.
      protected void clientDisconnected(ocsf.server.ConnectionToClient client)
      Hook method called each time a client disconnects.The method invoke the Server.ClientConnectionHandler.onClientDisconnected(String, int) if it exists.

      Hook method called each time an exception is thrown in a ConnectionToClient thread.

      Handles a command sent from one client to the server.

      Hook method called when the server stops accepting connections because an exception has been raised.

        Parameters:

    • Method Detail

      • clientConnected

        protected void clientConnected(ocsf.server.ConnectionToClient client)
        Hook method called each time a new client connection is accepted. The method invoke the Server.ClientConnectionHandler.onClientConnected(String, int) if it exists.
        Overrides:
        clientConnected in class ocsf.server.AbstractServer
        Parameters:
        client - the connection connected to the client.

      • clientDisconnected

        protected void clientDisconnected(ocsf.server.ConnectionToClient client)
        Hook method called each time a client disconnects.The method invoke the Server.ClientConnectionHandler.onClientDisconnected(String, int) if it exists.
        Overrides:
        clientDisconnected in class ocsf.server.AbstractServer
        Parameters:
        client - the connection with the client.

      • clientException

        protected void clientException(ocsf.server.ConnectionToClient client,
                               java.lang.Throwable throwable)
        Hook method called each time an exception is thrown in a ConnectionToClient thread. The method call serverStopped() if the server has stopped, also the method call clientDisconnected(ConnectionToClient).
        Overrides:
        clientException in class ocsf.server.AbstractServer
        Parameters:
        client - the client that raised the exception.
        throwable - the exception thrown.

      • handleMessageFromClient

        protected void handleMessageFromClient(java.lang.Object obj,
                                       ocsf.server.ConnectionToClient client)
        Handles a command sent from one client to the server. This method is called by a synchronized method so it is also implicitly synchronized.
        Specified by:
        handleMessageFromClient in class ocsf.server.AbstractServer
        Parameters:
        obj - the received message from client.
        client - the connection connected to the client that sent the message.

      • listeningException

        protected void listeningException(java.lang.Throwable exception)
        Hook method called when the server stops accepting connections because an exception has been raised. The method call serverStopped() if the server has stopped.
        Overrides:
        listeningException in class ocsf.server.AbstractServer
        Parameters:
        exception - the exception raised.

      • serverClosed

        protected void serverClosed()
        Overrides:
        serverClosed in class ocsf.server.AbstractServer

      • serverStarted

        protected void serverStarted()
        Hook method called when the server starts listening for connections. The method invoke the Server.ServerStatusHandler.onServerStarted() if it exists.
        Overrides:
        serverStarted in class ocsf.server.AbstractServer

      • serverStopped

        protected void serverStopped()
        Hook method called when the server stops accepting connections. The method invoke the Server.ServerStatusHandler.onServerStopped() if it exists.
        Overrides:
        serverStopped in class ocsf.server.AbstractServer

      • setClientConnectionHandler

        public void setClientConnectionHandler(@Nullable
                                       Server.ClientConnectionHandler clientConnectionHandler)
        Parameters:
        clientConnectionHandler - Handler of changes in client connections, if a handler exist the new one will swap him. null will remove the current handler.

      • setMessagesHandler

        public void setMessagesHandler(@Nullable
                               Server.MessagesHandler messagesHandler)
        Parameters:
        messagesHandler - Handler of messages, if a handler exist the new one will swap him. null will remove the current handler.

      • setServerActionHandler

        public void setServerActionHandler(@Nullable
                                   Server.ServerStatusHandler serverStatusHandler)
        Parameters:
        serverStatusHandler - Handler of changing in server status, if a handler exist the new one will swap him. null will remove the current handler.
